description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a delivery timeline, with custom view holder binding and animation logic.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying a sequence of delivery stages with status indicators and animations.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with new rows and refreshes the view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder for a delivery timeline item.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the dataset.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the view holder for a specific position.

inner_classes.name: VH
inner_classes.description: ViewHolder class for delivery timeline item views.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a DeliveryTimelineRow to the ViewHolder's views, setting icons, text, colors, and accessibility info.

methods.name: animateStageAdvanceIfNeeded
methods.description: Performs micro-animations when a stage transitions to completed or current, respecting reduced motion settings.
